summary: This document pertains to the registration and renewal of the aircraft N331JE, a Bell 430, owned by Hyperion Air LLC. It includes details about the aircraft's registration status, expiration, and requirements for renewal, as well as contact information for the FAA.

persons.name: Walter Binkley
persons.context: Walter Binkley is mentioned as the Manager of the FAA Aircraft Registry, responsible for issuing temporary certificates of registration.

persons.name: Lawrence
persons.context: Lawrence is identified as the Director of Aviation who signed a declaration regarding the international operations of the aircraft.

connections.description: Walter Binkley, as the Manager of the FAA Aircraft Registry, oversees the registration process for Hyperion Air LLC.
Lawrence, as the Director of Aviation, represents Hyperion Air LLC in matters related to aircraft operations.

events.title: Expiration of Aircraft Registration
events.description: The registration for aircraft N331JE expired on September 30, 2019, leading to the need for renewal.

events.title: Temporary Certificate Validity
events.description: The temporary certificate of registration for aircraft N331JE is valid until December 20, 2019.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Qtrs Ste B-3 St Thomas, VI 00802-1348
keyFacts: The registration for aircraft N331JE expired on September 30, 2019.
A temporary certificate of registration was issued, valid until December 20, 2019.
Walter Binkley is the Manager of the FAA Aircraft Registry.
Lawrence is the Director of Aviation for Hyperion Air LLC.
Hyperion Air LLC is located at 6100 Red Hook Qtrs Ste B-3 St Thomas, VI 00802-1348.
